title: Nursing Homes Support Scheme Act 2009, in exercise of the powers conferred
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Nursing Homes Support Scheme Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Nursing Homes Support Scheme Act 

2009 (Modification of Assessment of Eligible Rental Income) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited nursing home support scheme act 2009 (modification assessment eligible rental income) order 2023

title: Nursing Homes Support Scheme Act 2009, in exercise of the powers conferred
heading: In this Order, “Principal Act” means the Nursing Homes Support
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order, “Principal Act” means the Nursing Homes Support 

Scheme Act 2009 (No. 15 of 2009).
text_norm: 2 order principal act mean nursing home support scheme act 2009 (no 15 2009)

title: Nursing Homes Support Scheme Act 2009, in exercise of the powers conferred
heading: 3. With effect from 1 February 2024 –
text_raw:
3. With effect from 1 February 2024 – 

(a) 

in paragraph 2A of Part 1A of Schedule 1 to the Principal Act – 

(i) 

(ii) 

step I shall have effect as if “0 per cent” were substituted 
for “40 per cent”, and 

step K (so far as relating to the amount produced by step 
F) shall have effect as if “100 per cent” were substituted 
for “60 per cent”, 

(b) 

(c) 

step K of paragraph 2A of Part 2A of Schedule 1 to the Principal 
Act shall have effect as if “0 per cent” were substituted for “20 
per cent”, and 

step M of paragraph 2A of Part 2A of Schedule 1 to the 
Principal Act (so far as relating to the amount produced by step 
H) shall have effect as if “100 per cent” were substituted for “80 
per cent”. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

5 December, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th December, 2023.
